name: Ladder Crafters
description:
Amazing world of Ladder Crafters is waiting for you!

                                                                                                                            

Your objective is simple as the title: Crafting Ladders.

Resouces wait for getting mined and enemies wait for being slain. Build the
ladders with what you got, to maine more resources, slain more enemies, and walking on the mounting wall to the top. You know, what to do. Now go! Show the whole world, what amazing adventure this island has to offer.

                                                                                                               

Game by SaikingS from  KettuGames

music by Figus
